ai.summary: Oakwood Loop is a short, easy 2.6 km woodland loop in the UK, ideal for families and casual walkers seeking a peaceful stroll among trees. The trail is mostly flat with gentle grades and well-kept paths.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently rolling woodland paths with compact dirt or gravel surfaces. Expect occasional tree roots near the path, damp patches after rain, and shaded sections.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked trails. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Check the forecast; UK weather can change quickly. Bring water and snacks. Be mindful of ticks in woodland; perform a quick check after the hike. Carry a map or GPS, and have a charged phone for emergencies. Take care on uneven sections after rain; watch for cyclists on shared paths.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation (or fully charged smartphone with offline map)
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn (winter can be muddy and daylight-limited).
